credit_line: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council
title: Piazza del Popolo, Rome
medium: Pen and ink, brush and gray wash, charcoal on cream laid paper
description: View across the Piazza del Popolo of the twin churches of S. Maria in Montesanto on the left, and S. Maria dei Miracoli on the right, behind the Obelisk of Ramses II.
name: Drawing
